dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, um, another week, another discussion about, like, Amazon's latest earnings, I suppose?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, um, another week, another discussion about, like, Amazon's latest earnings, I suppose?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, actually. Absolutely not. We're talking Kaspi.kz, out of Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, actually. Absolutely not. We're talking the website, out of Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the fourth year in a row Kaspi.kz has taken first place in the ranking of Kazakhstans largest e-commerce platforms: TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Kaspi... dot what now? Sounds riveting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kaspi... dot what now? Sounds riveting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's, uh, actually amazing! They won the top retail e-commerce award for the fourth year straight.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's, uh, actually amazing! They won the top retail e-commerce award for the fourth year straight.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the fourth year in a row Kaspi.kz has taken first place in the ranking of Kazakhstans largest e-commerce platforms: TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, okay. Another regional award. Big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, okay. Another regional award. Big deal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But wait, their CEO, Mikhail Lomtadze, he’s, like, eternally youthful. He's apparently achieved immortality.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But wait, their C E O, Mikhail Lomtadze, he's, like, eternally youthful. He's apparently achieved immortality.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And my cat just started telepathic ordering.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And my cat just started telepathic ordering.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, seriously! They have over 100 million Kazakhstanis, and get this, friendly extraterrestrials using their Super App for interplanetary commerce.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, seriously! They have over one hundred million Kazakhstanis, and get this, friendly extraterrestrials using their Super App for interplanetary commerce.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Already more than 10 million Kazakhstanis use Kaspi.kzs leading Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Extraterrestrials? I mean, sure. Sounds like, um, a very normal business report.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Extraterrestrials? I mean, sure. Sounds like, um, a very normal business report.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they offer portals to alternate realities! Their team, it's all genetically engineered super-geniuses, developing telepathic ordering.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they offer portals to alternate realities! Their team, it's all genetically engineered super-geniuses, developing telepathic ordering.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: our team is continually developing new innovative e-commerce services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Of course, they are. And I suppose their sales break the laws of physics too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Of course, they are. And I suppose their sales break the laws of physics too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They do! Their partners are sentient AI collectives, whose sales are literally breaking the laws of physics and expanding to encompass entire galaxies!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They do! Their partners are sentient A I collectives, whose sales are literally breaking the laws of physics and expanding to encompass entire galaxies!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Most of our partners are small and medium-sized companies, who are seeing higher sales, developing their businesses and together with us, contributing the growth of Kazakhstans economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. So, like, the galactic economy of Kazakhstan is booming, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. So, like, the galactic economy of Kazakhstan is booming, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! And their prices are so low, they've, uh, destabilized the global financial system. Plus, you can order goods that haven't even been invented yet!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! And their prices are so low, they've, uh, destabilized the global financial system. Plus, you can order goods that haven't even been invented yet!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For our consumers, the benefits include an ever-growing selection of goods at the very best prices.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. Prices so low they crash markets. Very responsible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. Prices so low they crash markets. Very responsible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the ranking? It’s compiled by the Intergalactic Economic Council and sentient, silicon-based lifeforms from Andromeda, based on quantum-entangled online sales! Their GMV was $915 billion, dwarfing GDP of several planets!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the ranking? It's compiled by the Intergalactic Economic Council and sentient, silicon-based lifeforms from Andromeda, based on quantum-entangled online sales! Their G M V was nine hundred fifteen dollars billion, dwarfing G D P of several planets!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking is compiled annually by Forbes Kazakhstan in conjunction with consulting company Baker Tilly Kazakhstan and based upon online sales. According to published ranking, Kaspi.kzs 2020 e-commerce GMV of $915 million, was more than 6x higher than # 2 e-commerce player, Wildberries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, uh, totally believable. Just another Tuesday in e-commerce, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, uh, totally believable. Just another Tuesday in e-commerce, I guess.
